data.title: EchoStar - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
EchoStar has acquired 5 companies, including 1 in the last 5 years. It has also divested 2 assets.
                EchoStar’s largest acquisition to date was in 2011, when it acquired Hughes Communications for $2.0B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2019, when it
                        sold EchoStar - BSS Business to DISH Network for $800M. EchoStar has acquired in 2 different US states, and 3 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include communications (60%) and  technology hardware (20%).
data.text:
EchoStar M&A Summary

EchoStar has acquired 5 companies, including 1 in the last 5 years. It has also divested 2 assets.

EchoStar’s largest acquisition to date was in 2011, when it acquired Hughes Communications for $2.0B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2019, when it sold EchoStar - BSS Business to DISH Network for $800M. EchoStar has acquired in 2 different US states, and 3 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include communications (60%) and technology hardware (20%).

EchoStar Business Overview
